name: Departing Slot
description:
Departing Slot is an Arcade 3D Game in which you park cars in Hades.

You're Charon, ferryman of the underworld, but before carrying souls through the Styx, since souls carry their belongings through death, you need to get rid of the cars they died in.

Of course, such cars are not easy to park, as:

  1. They keep the damages they departed with
  2. You're in Hades, there are not a lot of optimal places to build a parking in

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • ENTER - change car
  • ESC - pause
  • Mouse - camera and menu

Made by Andrea Rosini and Lenny S.Jox in Unity 2020.3.32f1

Music by Artyom Gulyaev
